title: Great one bedroom available! Pre-war vintage charm
map_address: 2524 N Kedzie Blvd #3E near Kedzie & Wrightwood
posting_body: ['Wonderful Logan Square 1 bed, 1 bath available.', 'Amazing location—5 min walk to blue line train and all that Logan Square has to offer (across from Lula Cafe).', 'We lived here for 5 years and loved it.', 'Unit includes:', '• Spacious living room', '• Dining room', '• Decorative brick fireplace', '• Balcony', '• DISHWASHER', '• Ample closet space and additional basement storage unit', '• South-facing windows with lots of natural light', 'Building amenities:', '• Laundry on site', '• Beautiful courtyard', '• Well-maintained landscaping', '• Secure entryways', '• Attentive & friendly maintenance staff', 'Other Details:', '• 3rd Floor (top floor, no noise above you)', '• No security deposit', '• Pet friendly (ask for details)', 'We bought a house and are helping our landlord rent the unit.', 'Please call the leasing department at 773-661-0111 to set an appointment.', 'We are also selling our window a/c units.', "They're nearly new (used for 4 months since purchase at the end of Aug 2021).", 'Willing to strike a deal for these.', 'Reach out to us directly for purchase.', 'Details below.', 'At a glance:', '• Selling 3 units, individually or as a set', '• 8100', 'BTU: made for medium rooms', '• Ultra Quiet', '• Smart with Wi-Fi and App to control', '• Remotes and original boxes included', 'We moved to a place with central AC and no longer need but after spending 4 summers using hand-me-down window AC units this upgrade was an absolute DELIGHT.', 'Quiet.', 'Wi-Fi controlled.', 'Modern design.', 'Energy efficient.', 'But most importantly: kept us cool!', 'Individual price $225', 'Discount to purchase all 3 units: $600', 'Original price $349/per unit / $1154.32', 'Manufacturer details:', '• Ultra quiet operation at 43 dB, maximum comfort and minimum noise', '• Wirelessly monitor, schedule and control smart AC from anywhere', '• Energy efficient and quick cooling with 3 cooling and fan speeds']
